game.name: ABSØLVE
game.shortDescription: Welcome to ABSØLVE, a dark fantasy based hack-and-slash game, where you fight wave after wave of demons hordes using the chaotic Wheel of Judgement system to try and defeat as many monsters as possible in an attempt to gain absolution.
